bibl.title: P. Oxy. 2331 and Others.
bibl.note: I. P. Oxy. XXII, 2331: Anonymous (= Pack2 1931). - II. P. Oxy XVIII, 2162 fr. 1 (a), col. I, 15: Aeschylus (= Pack2 42). - III. P. Oxy. XX, 2256 fr. 8 (a) 16: Aeschylus (= Pack2 46). - IV. P. Oxy. XXIII, 2359: Stesichorus, Suotherai (= Pack2 1483). - V. P. Hibeh II, 173: Archilochus (= Pack2 196).
Page Denys L., P. Oxy. 2331 and Others.
364 Aeschylus Archilochus Carmina varia Graeca Stesichorus
